tool_description: Webtor API allows you to instantly download and stream torrent content without use of BitTorrent client.
name: Webtor
title: Webtor

api_list.name: Export Resource Content
api_list.description:
Exports resource content.
Provide urls to consume torrent content for download and streaming.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://webtor.p.rapidapi.com/resource/08ada5a7a6183aae1e09d831df6748d566095a10/export/ca2453df3e7691c28934eebed5a253ee0aabd29f"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "webtor.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://webtor.p.rapidapi.com/resource/{resource_id}/export/{content_id}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "webtor.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: List Resource Contents
api_list.description:
Lists files and directories of specific resource.
All ids in response can be used for export.

api_list.name: Get Resource
api_list.description: Receives resource id and returns resource.
